charges.charge_description: aiding and abetting another, did knowingly take a motor vehicle, that is a maroon, 1999 Dodge Caravan, bearing VIN 2B4GP44G4XR376190:, which had been transported in interstate commerce, from the person or presence of Chris Jackson, by means of force and violence or by intimidation, and at or during the time the defendant took said motor vehicle, he intended to cause death or serious bodily injury. All in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 2119 and 2.
